edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom
Class ValidationMessage

java.lang.Object
  edu.psu.citeseerx.corecom.ValidationMessage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public abstract class ValidationMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Container for validation messages, used by ObjectTransferConnections to make sure that the connection is working properly.
